body_html: @soumith There are instances where a single process group is used for a barrier between 2+ hour asynchronous tasks that complete with some variance (e.g. +/- 10m). I'm working on supporting per operation timeouts that will allow you to explicitly set a timeout on a barrier to do this, but until then we have to use a single timeout for all ops.
